name: powerlifting
description: A strength sport that involves three main lifts: Squat, Bench Press, and Deadlift. In a competition, one has three attempts at max weight when attempting each main lift.

name: strength
description: Strength training focuses on increasing strength, power, and endurance. It typically involves resistance-based exercises such as using weights, bands, or your own body weight

name: stretching
description: Stretching is a physical exercise that focuses on a specific muscle or tendon to be expanded and flexed to improve elasticity and achieve comfortable muscle tone.

name: cardio
description: Cardio, sometimes referred to as aerobic exercise, is a rhythmic activity that raises heart rate over a period of time. This is the best way to burn the most fat and calories.

name: Olympic weightlifting
description: A strength sport that involves lifting a weighted barbell from the ground to overhead.

name: strongman
description: A training style that involves picking up and holding a weight in a variety of exercises that differ in each workout. The variety can change from the amount of weight, reps, what you lift, and how you lift them.

name: plyometrics
description: A form of exercise that uses speed and force of different movements to increase power.
